column2: Since we are on such excellent terms, it may be prudent to offer a Brief Non-Aggression-Pact! This will last 5 years and will give us a chance to form a proper alliance if [Root.GetTitledName] is willing.
I hope this letter finds you well friend. would you care to cement our friendship with a brief non-aggression pact? Signed, [FromFrom.GetTitledName].
Dear [Root.GetTitledName], Of course I accept your brief non-aggression-pact! Why would we go to war, except as allies? Signed, [From.GetTitledName].
Dear [Root.GetTitledName], Unfortunately, I do not find it in my best interests to agree to a brief non-aggression-pact at this time. Signed, [From.GetTitledName].
[From.GetTitledName] has not recently sent an offer for a Brief Non-Aggression-Pact
[Root.GetTitledName] is capable of forming an alliance with [From.GetTitledName]
